info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 9:59PM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, moderate flood stage with numerous homes in the Maples area of Shelton affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to 14.5 feet tomorrow morning, just below moderate flood stage. It will remain between 14.5 and 13 feet through Friday morning and then begin to fall. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 9 pm: 9.6 Forecast: Tue 7 pm MSG Wed 1 am 11.4 Wed 7 am 14.5 Wed 1 pm 14.4 Wed 7 pm 14.4 Thu 1 am 14.4 Thu 7 am 14.5 Thu 1 pm 13.6 Thu 7 pm 13.1 Fri 1 am 13.1 Fri 7 am 13.1 Fri 1 pm 11.3 &&
